\title{Short Essay 4}
\date{}

\begin{document}
\maketitle

\subsubsection{Prompt}\label{prompt}

Write a coherent short time travel story that contains a perfect causal
loop. Your story must contain as few metaphysical problems as possible.
It must also have as few plot holes as possible.

\subsubsection{Further Instruction}\label{further-instruction}

\begin{itemize}
\itemsep1pt\parskip0pt\parsep0pt
\item
  Write in very simple English prose.
\item
  Give vivid, specific details.
\item
  Write 500-750 words. No more. No less.
\item
  Submit your responses by Mon. @ 12:45pm.
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
